entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 9:51 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:51 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
